name: Quinton: Zhang Fei
description: Zhang Fei, surnamed Yide, was a famous general of Shu and Han during the Three Kingdoms period. He was known as the enemy of thousands of people together with Guan Yu. He was extremely brave, brave and good at fighting, and made great achievements. He won Xichuan, captured Yan Yan, and defeated Zhang Qian. After Liu Bei became emperor, he was appointed as a general of chariot and cavalry, a lieutenant of the school, and a marquis of Xixiang.
